title: Oglet-Khefifa
text:
Oglet Khefifa is a locality in <a href="Sfax%20Governorate">Sfax Governorate</a> southern <a href="Tunisia">Tunisia</a>, located in the <a href="semi%20arid">semi arid</a> area <a href="south">south</a> of <a href="Sfax">Sfax</a>.
<a href="Ruins">Ruins</a> at Oglet Khefifa have previously been identified with <a href="Macomades">Macomades</a> now thought to be little farther to the north, at <a href="Henchir%20el%20Ghorib">Henchir el Ghorib</a> .
An interpretation of the text of the life of <a href="saint">St.</a> <a href="Fulgentius%20of%20Ruspe">Fulgence</a> makes identification with the remains of ancient <a href="Bennefa">Bennefa</a> more probable.
